sentences.en: A contingent proposition may be true and may equally be false.
sentences.cn: 一个偶然的命题可能是正确的，也同样可能是错误的。

sentences.en: Has the Scottish contingent arrived yet?
sentences.cn: 苏格兰代表团到了没有？

sentences.en: He wanted to know about the size of the press contingent to accompany the President.
sentences.cn: 他想知道随同总统访问的记者能派多少.

sentences.en: I stood and watched a contingent of troops marching through the streets.
sentences.cn: 我站在那看着一支分遣队从街上走过.

sentences.en: In effect, growth is contingent on improved incomes for the mass of the low-income population.
sentences.cn: 事实上，发展有赖于大量低收入人群收入的增长。

sentences.en: Nigeria provided a large contingent of troops to the West African Peacekeeping Force.
sentences.cn: 尼日利亚向西非维和部队派遣了一大批军队。

sentences.en: Our success is contingent upon your continued help.
sentences.cn: 我们的成功全靠你的不断帮助.

sentences.en: Such risks are contingent to the trade.
sentences.cn: 这种危险对于那种生意是可能有的.

sentences.en: The benefit is not contingent on National Insurance Contributions.
sentences.cn: 这种补贴并不是由国民保险分担额决定的.

sentences.en: The chopper would not arrive until after the press contingent had departed by bus.
sentences.cn: 记者组乘大客车离开后飞机再来.

sentences.en: The contingent marched in the direction of the Western Hills.
sentences.cn: 队伍朝西山的方向前进.

sentences.en: The enthymeme and the example must, then, deal with what is in the main contingent, the example being an induction, and the enthymeme a syllogism, about such matters.
sentences.cn: 推理论证和例证法因而必须处理主要的偶然事件，例证法是对此类事项的归纳推理，推理论证则是对其的三段论。

sentences.en: The naval contingent was expected to come.
sentences.cn: 我们期望海军分遣队到来.

sentences.en: The punctual arrival of an airplane is contingent on the weather.
sentences.cn: 飞机是否准时到达要看天气而定.

sentences.en: The whistles from the large contingent of England fans away to our left are deafening.
sentences.cn: 我们左边一大群英格兰球迷发出震耳欲聋的口哨声。

sentences.en: Their contingent consisted of at least two thousand people.
Whether or not we arrive on time is contingent on the weather.
sentences.cn: 我们是否按时到达要视天气情况而定.

words.tran_cn: 接触；相切；偶然性（等于contingency）；意外事件；可能发生的附带事件
偶然性；[安全] 意外事故；可能性；[审计] 意外开支
继续；续集；延长；附加部分；扩建物

phrases.tran_cn: 未定权益；或有求偿权；附带要求
或有负债；不确定债务；临时负债

trans.tran_en: depending on something that may happen in the future
a group of people who all have something in common, such as their nationality, beliefs etc, and who are part of a larger group
